line_1: Into that Limb fair Alma slides,
Thus o'er the oiled surface softly slides
line_2: And from the impervious plain pellucid glides;

line_1: As she carelessly trips often slides,
line_2: All the charms that her modesty hides.

line_1: And o'er the adhesive train the magnet slides;
line_2: Then thrice and thrice with steady eye he guides,

line_1: On whispering wheels the silver axle slides,
line_2: Climbs into air, and cleaves the crystal tides;

line_1: Down from Olympus Top he Slides,
line_2: Laughing as if he'd butst his Sides:
